930180.name: VR2: Vacate 2 Rooms - Extras
930180.description:
Finally the original Soundtrack to VR2: Vacate 2 Rooms is released. Also included is the underground Drum'N'Base Remix that was never before released in full and the original Song that was created by hOSHI more than 10 years ago in a Music Tracker Software and - until now - only known to insiders.

Also included in this DLC is the complete Guide to VR2: Vacate 2 Rooms in case you need help solving a few of the harder puzzles.

The third item in this DLC is a Concept Book that includes puzzle concepts, scribbles and game design hints.

Contents:

  • 5 music tracks: 1 Soundtrack, 1 Drum'N'Base Remix, 1 Original, 2 Bonus Tracks
  • VR2: Vacate 2 Rooms - Concept Book
  • Walkthrough Guide (Spoiler Alert!)

Tracks:

  • 1 Vacate 2 Rooms - Soundtrack
  • 2 Vacate the Room - Sountrack (Drum & Bass Remix)
  • 3 Vacate the Room - Sountrack (Classic Music Tracker Version)
  • 4 Bonus Track - The Quest for the BIG KEY
  • 5 Bonus Track - hOSHIs Elektronauts
